LoginPage.title: Welcome to OM Suivi
LoginPage.description: Log in or create an account to track your work time.
LoginPage.nameMinLengthError: Name must contain at least 2 characters.
LoginPage.passwordMinLengthError: Password must contain at least 6 characters.
LoginPage.registerErrorInUse: This email address is already in use.

TimeTrackingPage.title: Time Tracking
TimeTrackingPage.statusInProgress: Your work session is in progress.
TimeTrackingPage.statusOnMission: You are currently on a mission.
TimeTrackingPage.statusIdle: Select your shift and start tracking.
TimeTrackingPage.selectShiftPlaceholder: Select your shift for the day
TimeTrackingPage.recentEntriesDescription: A log of your recent work sessions.
TimeTrackingPage.shiftNotSelectedDescription: Please select your shift before starting the timer.
TimeTrackingPage.geoNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support geolocation.
TimeTrackingPage.geoFailedDescription: Could not get your position. Please check permissions.
TimeTrackingPage.locationConfirmDescriptionPart1: AI suggests your current location is
TimeTrackingPage.locationConfirmDescriptionPart2: . Do you want to associate this location with your time entry?
TimeTrackingPage.stopConfirmDescription: You are stopping the timer. Are you ending your shift or on a delivery mission?
TimeTrackingPage.statusUpdatedDescription: You are now on a mission. The timer continues.

ManualEntryDialog.title: Add Manual Entry
ManualEntryDialog.description: Enter your start and end times for a past work session.
ManualEntryDialog.endTimeErrorAlert: End time must be after start time.

ProfilePage.title: Settings
ProfilePage.personalInfoDescription: Manage your personal and contractual information.
ProfilePage.nameMinLengthError: Name must contain at least 2 characters.
ProfilePage.salaryDescription: Your hourly rate is calculated automatically (Salary / 173.33) and rounded.
ProfilePage.remindersDescription: Set up alerts to avoid forgetting to clock in/out.
ProfilePage.enableRemindersDescription: Receive a notification to record your hours.
ProfilePage.workplaceDescription: Define your primary workplace for geolocation-based features.
ProfilePage.setWorkZoneButton: Set Current Location as Work Zone
ProfilePage.locationDeniedError: Location access denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.
ProfilePage.settingsUpdatedDescription: Your information has been saved successfully.
ProfilePage.locationErrorDescription: Could not get your position. Please check browser permissions.
ProfilePage.workplaceSetDescription: Your work zone has been successfully saved.
ProfilePage.confirmWorkplaceTitle: Are you currently at your workplace?
ProfilePage.confirmWorkplaceDescription: This location (Lat: {latitude}, Lon: {longitude}) will be used to track your shifts.
ProfilePage.updateDisabledTooltip: You cannot change your work zone while working. Please end your shift first.

ReportsPage.title: Dashboard
ReportsPage.description: A summary of your earnings and work hours.
ReportsPage.financialSummaryDescription: An overview of your regular hours, overtime, and estimated earnings for the current month.
ReportsPage.weeklyBreakdownDescription: Regular vs. overtime hours logged each day of the current week.

ExportReportPage.title: Export Report
ExportReportPage.footerDisclaimer: This document is an auto-generated proof of work for services rendered.

TeamPage.title: Team Overview
TeamPage.description: A summary of hours worked by your colleagues this week.
TeamPage.weeklySummaryDescription: Data sharing and summarization for colleagues.
TeamPage.noTeamTitle: You are not yet on a team
TeamPage.noTeamDescription: Contact your administrator to be added to a team to see your colleagues' data.

Shared.pleaseCompleteProfile: Please complete your profile before viewing reports.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
